enchantments.guide.title.description: Title of the enchantments guide page

enchantments.guide.tip.message: **Tip:** To get overloaded enchantments, combine 2 enchantments of the same level to get the next level (e.g., 4+4 = 5, 5+5 = 6, ...). The cost will not get too expensive!

enchantments.no_vanilla_enchantments.description: Message when no vanilla enchantments are available

enchantments.no_custom_enchantments.description: Message when no custom enchantments are available

enchantments.level.description: Label for enchantment level with placeholder

enchantments.decrease_level.description: Aria label for decrease level button

enchantments.increase_level.description: Aria label for increase level button
